com.camerontec.catalys.core.fixvalidation

Interface IValidatorWithAttributes

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IHasAttributes, IValidator
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IValidatorContainerWithAttributes
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFieldValidatorContainer, AbstractValidatorContainerWithAttributes, AbstractValidatorWithAttributes, MessageRuleSetValidator, MessageValidator, OptionalFieldsValidator, RequiredFieldsValidator

    public interface IValidatorWithAttributes
extends IValidator, IHasAttributes
    A interface for configurable validators.

    A implementor of this interface:

    • implements IValidator.validate(com.camerontec.catalys.core.message.IFIXMessage),
    • has attributes so that it can instantiated from a configuration source (e.g., a XML config file), and
    • is serializable

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.camerontec.catalys.core.fixvalidation.IValidator

        validate

      • Methods inherited from interface com.camerontec.catalys.util.attributesupport.IHasAttributes

        addAttributeChangeListener, getAttribute, getAttributeNames, getAttributes, refreshStateFromAttributes, removeAttributeChangeListener, setAttribute, setAttributes
